content.text: Hello! How are you?
Great! Just got back from a bike ride. You?
I'm doing well, thanks. I just finished watching Pretty Woman. What kind of bike do you ride?
I ride a mountain bike. I love being outdoors. Where are you from?
I grew up in the country, where there was plenty of land to grow sunflowers. Where are you from?
I'm from out of town. I moved here for work. My best friend is here, too.
That's nice. I love my green tea set. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to travel. I've been to a lot of places. I also like to create beautiful things with my hands.
That's cool. I'm not much of a traveler. I'm more of a homebody. I like to relax and watch movies.
I can tell right away if I'm going to like someone. What are some of your favorite movies?
My favorite movie is Pretty Woman. I also like the Lord of the Rings trilogy. What are some of your favorite movies?
I like the Lord of the Rings trilogy, too. I also like the Harry Potter movies and the Hunger Games movies.
Those are all great movies. I love the fantasy genre.
Me, too. I'm a big fan of dragons. I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right.
That's a cool idea. I'd like to be reincarnated as a mermaid, so I could swim in the ocean and explore the world.
That would be awesome! I love the ocean. I would love to be able to swim in the ocean all the time.
Me, too. The ocean is so beautiful.
Yes, it is. I love the feeling of the water on my skin.
Me, too. I love swimming.
Me, too. It's so relaxing.
